translation.en: [woman] They say that when you die,
translation.ja: ビフォア･マイ･アイズ ビフォア･マイ･アイズ 人は死ぬ間際に 人は死ぬ間際に

translation.en: your life flashes before your eyes.
translation.ja: 過去の記憶がよみがえると聞く
それは走馬灯のように

translation.en: Bring your awareness to your breath.
…collected together to remind you of all the incredible things…
translation.ja: 宝物のような記憶を思い起こさせ
いい思い出や 嫌な思い出

translation.en: [woman] If you could control that flashback
translation.ja: もし その回想を操って

translation.en: and live in the moment again…
Something is up. You know I can always tell with you.
translation.ja: どうしたの　何かあった？

translation.en: What… what do you mean "seeing something?"
It's always vague and in my periphery.
translation.ja: 近くに何かを感じるの

translation.en: Do you remember Dr. Bones? He was this thing when we were growing up.
translation.ja: ドクター･ボーンズってキャラ 覚えてない？

translation.en: This… this, like, vulture skull creature, and--
translation.ja: ドクター･ボーンズってキャラ 覚えてない？ テレビ番組に出てたハゲワシの…

translation.en: No. You're right. You're right. It sounds mad.
Well, saying it out loud, it does sound a bit crazy.
translation.ja: 言葉にするとバカみたい

translation.en: Uh, tell me again why we have, uh, Vulture Man in here every night.
translation.ja: なんでバルチャーがベッドにいるの？

translation.en: [sighing] He's called Dr. Bones, and he makes me feel safe.
translation.ja: ドクター･ボーンズだよ私の安定剤なんだ

translation.en: I thought that was my job.
Well, every hero needs a sidekick.
[both] ♪ He's on your street, and he's in your home, sound the alarm ♪
translation.ja: 道端や家で　　アラームが鳴る

translation.en: [in funny voice] Time to wake up!
Get off. God, you're such a kid.

translation.ja: いいよ　置いとけよ

translation.en: -And you know that tatty old thing with… -[gasping] Rude.
translation.ja: その汚い人形は… 失礼ね

translation.en: Well, it would actually look much nicer in a… in a nursery
translation.ja: 別の場所が似合うよ 他の人形と一緒に子ども部屋に置くとか

translation.en: surrounded by some other slightly less terrifying toys,
translation.ja: 他の人形と一緒に子ども部屋に置くとか

translation.en: I love you more than chips.
[Jess] And if it finally gets you to decorate that spare room, then I'm in.
translation.ja: あの部屋を整えてくれるなら喜んで

translation.en: Oh, I… -I have to ask you something, actually. -[Jess] Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: そういえば聞きたいことが

translation.en: If you wanna be Dr. Bones' sidekick, you're gonna have to prove yourself.
translation.ja: 助手らしいところ見せてよ

translation.en: All right, look, if I'm not back in five minutes,

translation.ja: 分かったから　ほら行って

translation.en: -I didn't mean it. He just came at me. -Scott?
[Jess panting] Oh my God. Where am I?
translation.ja: 待って　ここはどこ？
死んだ？　私 死んだのね

translation.en: [Jess] Come on, Jess. You can do this.
Practice what you preach. Control your breathing.
translation.ja: 教室でやるように呼吸を整えて

translation.en: Slow it down. Control your breath.
translation.ja: 呼吸を使って遅らせなきゃ

translation.en: You're doing it. Slow your breath down. Breathe.
translation.ja: その調子呼吸をゆっくりにして

translation.en: I need to find Scott. Warn him.
Jess, you having a good birthday, love? Go follow your friends.
translation.ja: 誕生日会を楽しめよ友達は？

translation.en: You haven't started. How've you been shot already?
translation.ja: 気が早いな　まだだろ

translation.en: Someone broke into the apartment. Scott is dead! And they shot me!
translation.ja: 泥棒が入ってスコットも私も殺された

translation.en: Gross. Jess, what are you doing?
I… I just saw you dead!
You have to stay away from me!
In twelve years' time, we work together at a local gym.
translation.ja: 12年後の私たちはジムの同僚なの

translation.en: You as a PT and me as a yoga instructor.
translation.ja: トレーナーとヨガ講師だよ

translation.en: It's my 25th birthday and all my friends forget so you take me to the worst Italian place in the city,
translation.ja: 25歳の誕生日に一緒にスパゲティを食べた

translation.en: and we eat spaghetti bolognese like Lady and the Tramp.
-What are you talking about, Jess? -I get wine drunk.
translation.ja: 訳が分からない 酔って足首を痛めた私を車で送ってくれて

translation.en: Slip and hurt my ankle. You offer to drive me home, and I accept.
translation.ja: 酔って足首を痛めた私を車で送ってくれて

translation.en: You carry me all the way to my door, and it's the third-floor apartment.
translation.ja: ４階の部屋まで担いでくれた

translation.en: You're so tired you end up passed out on my sofa watching The Office on Netflix.
translation.ja: そしてNETFLIXを見ながら寝落ちする

translation.en: [Jess] Sort… sort of. [sighing] You'll find out.
translation.ja: そんな感じそのうち分かるよ

translation.en: In the morning, we have breakfast, and you tell me you've liked me since we were 13.
translation.ja: そして私に告白する“13歳の私の誕生日から―”

translation.en: So you'll have to promise me you'll do what I say.
[woman] Battle commences in T-minus one minute.

translation.ja: ジェス　今日の君は変だ

translation.en: [Jess] I really need you to understand.
Maybe if we never get together, things will change. You'd be alive!
translation.ja: 付き合わなければ死なずに済むかも

translation.en: [laughing] Jess, I didn't know there would be a Dr. Bones here as well.
translation.ja: ドクター･ボーンズとは驚いた

translation.en: [Jess] Scott, I need you to promise you'll never talk to me again.
translation.ja: 私と二度と話さないと約束して

translation.en: We can't get into a relationship. If we do, we both die.
translation.ja: 付き合ったら死んじゃう
信じて 分かった　二度と話さない

translation.en: -I believe you. I won't talk to you again. -Please.
translation.ja: 分かった　二度と話さない

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay, it's time.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　時間になった

translation.en: I love you more than chips.
And if I'm not back in five minutes,

translation.ja: よし　呼吸を整えて
心と体 そして呼吸に

translation.en: for allowing you to practice today.
[Jess] What if you could change the past?
[Jess] Avoid what went wrong the first time around?
translation.ja: 失敗をやり直せるなら？

translation.en: What if you're presented with an opportunity to take another path?
translation.ja: 違う人生を歩む機会があったら

translation.en: Even if it leads to someone else's happy ending?
translation.ja: 自分の幸せを犠牲にしても？

translation.en: I've got all the time in the world to find mine.
translation.ja: 幸せになる時間はたっぷりある

translation.en: ♪ He's on your street And he's in your home ♪ ♪ Sound the alarm ♪
translation.ja: 道端や家で　　アラームが鳴る
